name: Gavin Stonehart
description: Gavin is a musician in Del Sol Valley. He is currently writing his sophomore album.

description: Jasper is an amateur hockey player in Del Sol Valley. He also streams workout routines.

description: Nathaniel is an author in Del Sol Valley. He draws from many experiences in his writing.

description: Sage is a full-time streamer in Del Sol Valley. He does programming and video games.
